name: VisionPlus
overview:
Vision+ helps entrepreneurs and developers to create and commercialize great products. Vision+ invests into products by using a new investment model which enables developers to retain rights into the products they have developed, to foster their own IP portfolio, and thus build better and more valuable companies. Vision+ will match-make product development projects with customers and will help with marketing to launch products successfully.

Their investment philosophy is based on the fact that people love great products. They help entrepreneurs and developers to bring joyful and rewarding experiences to their customers.
